subject: Re: [junit] Junit-add-ons to test private methods.
msgSnippet: ... There s a PrivateAccessor class (or something similarly named) in there and its documentation should be enough to help you get started. Vladimir admits
messageBody:
meera.ramachandran@... wrote:

> Please let me know how to test Private methods in Junit using Junit
> add-ons?

There's a PrivateAccessor class (or something similarly named) in there
and its documentation should be enough to help you get started. Vladimir
admits that although he built the class, he doesn't use it.

An alternative is to use JUnitX (search the web).

As another responder has mentioned, though, you might benefit from just
making the method public.
--
